topic_list.topic: Presentation about features of the user interface
Presentation which linked the project with market interests
Further discussion about the design of the remote control

general_query_list.answer: In the discussion, team members did presentations and talked about the design of the remote control. Project Manager introduced the aim of the second meeting and new project requirement. Project Manager said that the team did not need to pay attention to teletext and lighting adaptive. Then Industrial Designer, User Interface and Marketing gave presentations respectively. Industrial Designer proposed that they could add software functionalities on programmable chips and could use the FPGA. User Interface focused on reducing the number of buttons and recommended navigation buttons. Marketing discussed a lot of ideas including using a speech recogniser, the size of the remote control and lighting adaptive options. In the end they discussed some topics like teletext and accessing the Internet.

specific_query_list.query: What was the decision of the discussion about industrial working design?
specific_query_list.answer: The team would add some software functionalities on programmable chips browsing by the content or things like that. They would use the FPGA for the functionalities and use chargers rather than batteries.

specific_query_list.query: Why did Industrial Designer recommend the FPGA when talking about industrial working design?
specific_query_list.answer: Industrial Designer said that FPGA was a field programmable gateway array. The Bluetooth chip was just responsible to make the communication between the two devices, but the FPGA was different. The FPGA would produce the data to send and it was for software.

specific_query_list.query: Why did Industrial Designer recommend a charger rather than a battery when talking about industrial working design?
specific_query_list.answer: The remote control did not need very much power. Users could put it on the charger when they did not need to use it. People don't like it to have to buy the batteries when they run out, so a charger could be more user friendly.

specific_query_list.query: What were the main points of Marketing when giving a presentation which linked the project with market interests?
specific_query_list.answer: Marketing thought that users would be interested in a speech recogniser and it could help users choose the program then reduce the number of buttons. The remote control should be small and comparatively cheap. Not many people were interested in lighting adapting options, so it was for the Industrial Designer and Users Interface designer to decide if it's going to be working or not.

specific_query_list.query: What did the team decide about the speech recogniser when talking about presentation which linked the project with market interests?
specific_query_list.answer: The team would design a speech recogniser in the remote control to help choose the program. It would be small. They would balance the features and the cost when designing it.

specific_query_list.query: What did the team agree about lighting adaptive options when talking about the presentation which linked the project with market interests?
specific_query_list.answer: Lighting adaptive was a little bit complex. It was possible but not in this project.
